title: Ticket #4068: batch_test.pl: -b option takes minimum of 3 minutes.
description: batch_test.pl -b (-buildandtest, sets up a personal HTCondor for the tests) causes a 3 minute delay before doing anything useful. It's waiting for a non-existent HTCondor to start up; when it never shows up, it then starts HTCondor. This is a waste of time and makes running a single test on the command line frustratingly slow.
check_ins: 2013-Nov-14 13:55   Check-in [38730]: batch_test.pl -b: Eliminate 3 minute wait on start Eliminate unnecessary check for a running HTCondor. #4068 (By Alan De Smet )
